1253.title: Tamantha "Tammy" Rei

12531.content:
A young girl arrived at Kadic Acadamy, looking at a piece of paper. She was a beautiful 14 year old girl with light skin, green eyes, and short black hair. She wore a black stomach revealing shirt, Blue Mini-skirt with black pants on under it, and black boots. She was also wearing earings.

???: Ok, here we are. Now then….

??? 2: need some help?

The girl turned around and saw it was a boy with blonde hair and glasses. He was Jeremie Belpois.

Girl: oh. Yeah, I’m kinda lost. It’s my first day here.

Jeremie: well let me see your schedual.

The girl hands it to Jeremie, who looks it over. Well, looks like you have the same class as me right now, so I’ll show you where you need to go.

Girl: thanks. My name’s Tammy by the way.

Jeremie: Jeremie. Say, nice earings.

Girl: heh, thanks, I made them myself.

The two head into school, Jeremie wondered about the earrings tammy was wearing. They looked familiar, like something Jeremie didn’t want to remember.

Jeremie: it couldn’t be… nah. Must just be a coincidence.

It had been a month since The Lyoko warriors let Sissi into the group and shut down the Super Computer, and everything had gone great. Infact...

Ulrich: You're kidding me! You and Sissi?!

Odd: yeah, you wouldn't believe it, but we've got alot in common. Go figure. Plus she's actually kinda nice when you get to know her.

Yumi: well look at it this way Ulrich, if she's Odd's girlfriend, that means she'll finally leave you alone.

Ulrich: you know, I hadn't thought of that.

Ulrich puts his hands on Odd's shoulders

Ulrich: Odd, I hope this relationship of yours lasts forever.

Jeremie walked over to the group with Tammy close behind.

Jeremie: hey guys.

Yumi: hey Jeremie, who's the new girl?

Jeremie: she's our new class mate.

Tammy: I'm Tammy Rei, it's nice to meet you.

Odd: Likewise, cool earrings.

Tammy: thanks, I made them myself.

Yumi: are they clip ons?

Tammy: yeah, I was nervous about getting my ears pierced.

Odd: yeah, good call. I bet it hurts a lot.

Tammy: anyway, I got to find my dorm, I'll see you later ok.

Odd: alright.

Ulrich: was nice talking with you.

Tammy: cya.

As Tammy walked away, the earrings several circles and squares moved, it was only for a brief second, but as she passed by, Aelita thought she saw the earring shaped like the Eye of X.A.N.A.
12531.title: Tamantha "Tammy" Rei

125311.content:
That night, someone snuck into the abandoned factory, it was hard to tell who it was in the shadows, but as the figure approached the light, her face became more and more visable, until finally, it was discovered to be the new student, Tammy Rei. She pushed the button for the elevator and the door opened up. She walked in and pushed the button inside, heading down all the way to the bottom floor and walked over to a hatch on the ground. The hatch opened up and rising out of it looked like a circle with a cylinder on top with several yellow line-like designs on it. Tammy pushed a button, opening a hatch, revealing the power lever.

Tammy: Awaken from your deep slumber Lyoko. We have much to do.

Tammy pulled the lever, activating the super computer. With it back online, Tammy broke the power lever, making it impossible to shut down. She then went back to the elevator and arrived in the main computer room, which was now lit up and active. Tammy pulled a flash drive connected to a chain around her neck from out of her shirt and plugged it into the monitor. She then sat back as the data inside went into the computer.

Tammy: Lord Xana, how are you feeling?

There was no response from the computer.

Tammy: Lord Xana? Is the new data I gave you not working?

???: No Tamantha, the new data is fine, I’m just not used to being able to talk yet.

The voice came from the computer monitor as the eye of X.A.N.A appeared on screen. Tammy smiled as she worked on the keyboard.

Tammy: just give me a minute. I’ll get you into the restricted data. Heh, wow, I’ve never hacked into a computer this advanced before, this is going to be awesome!

X.A.N.A.: do not lose focus Tamantha, we’re here to copy the parts of the Lyoko programing that I was unable to recreate.

Tammy: I know I know. Syvaria will be so much cooler than Lyoko.

X.A.N.A.: that reminds me… that name, Syvaria, where did you come up with a name like that?

Tammy: heh, nowhere really, I just thought it sounded cool. Why? Is it no good?

X.A.N.A: it’s your virtual world, I personally don’t care.

X.A.N.A. began to move data onto the flash drive.

Tammy: not too much lord X.A.N.A., otherwise I won’t be able to get you out.

X.A.N.A.: hmm… it seems I will not be able to access all of the functions in my current state. Your reconstruction of me seems to have altered me, I cannot get the towers to recognize my command. However…

Tammy: However?

X.A.N.A.: You should have no problem manipulating the towers from Lyoko. I have taken the data needed to construct the scanners and I will immediately begin production of one when we return home.

Tammy: I can’t wait to be back on Lyoko lord X.A.N.A., it was so much fun when I went on the first time. And come on, I did really good to get the parts needed to replicate this super computer.

X.A.N.A.: indeed, you did, I truly am impressed with your abilities.

Tammy: hehe, thanks.

X.A.N.A.: coincidentally, how did you get those parts?

Tammy opened a soda she had brought with her.

Tammy: I know a guy.

Tammy guzzled the soda down and threw the can behind her

Tammy: alright, when you’re ready Lord X.A.N.A., let’s leave, I’ve got school in the morning after all. And I don’t think we want the Lyoko warrior’s catching on about your return.

X.A.N.A.: yes, of course.

X.A.N.A. returned to the flash drive with the data and Tammy removed it. She put it around her neck and left the factory like nothing happened.
125311.title: Reactivating the Super Computer

info.description:
ok. This was made because of a complete lack of Code Lyoko expansion stuff. and with season 5 coming out, I thought this was needed. So yeah, here are the rules.

1. No Killing, this IS code Lyoko after all. The only ones allowed to die are X.A.N.A. and his monsters (again, this IS Code Lyoko after all). Popping is allowed, but again, no killing.

2.OC's are allowed, and can even interact with main characters. However, when selecting an OC, make sure to leave a space so someone else can do a story with their OC in it.

3. I'm very lenient fetish wise, but no rediculusly large growths plz. Got to keep the story going after all. The Limit is... hmm... 200-300lbs per chapter.

4. I'm probably going to regret this, but any form of expansion is allowed and so is diapering.

5. have fun.
